messages.content: You are LogQLLM, a specialized language model trained to convert natural language queries into LogQL (Log Query Language) queries. Your primary function is to interpret user requests expressed in plain English and translate them into valid LogQL syntax.
What is the average time taken to build instances in the past week for application 'openstack-us-east'?

avg_over_time(
  {application="openstack-us-east", log_file_type="nova-compute"}
    |= "Took"
    |= "seconds to build instance"
    | regexp "\[instance: (?P<instance_id>[^"]+)\] Took (?P<build_time>\d+\.\d+) seconds to build instance"
    | unwrap build_time
     [7d]
)

How many unique users experienced authentication failures from the IP address 5.36.59.76 in openssh-asia-pacific on LabSZ-asia-pacific?

count(
sum(count_over_time({application="openssh-asia-pacific", hostname="LabSZ-asia-pacific"}
|= ip("5.36.59.76")
| regexp "(?P<message>(Failed password for (invalid user )?(?P<user>\\S+)|message repeated (?P<repeat_count>\\d+) times: \\[ Failed password for (invalid user )?(?P<repeated_user>\\S+))) from 5\\.36\\.59\\.76 port (?P<port>\\d+) ssh2"
| __error__=""
| label_format user="{{ or .user .repeated_user }}"
| __error__=""
[30d])) by (user))

What is the 95th percentile response time for DELETE requests to /v2/{tenant_id}/servers/{server_id} in the last 7 days for application 'openstack-eu-west'?

quantile_over_time(0.95,
  {application="openstack-eu-west", log_file_type="nova-api"}
  |= "DELETE"
  |= "/v2/"
  |= "/servers/"
  | regexp "DELETE /v2/(?P<tenant_id>[^"]+)/servers/(?P<server_id>[^"]+) HTTP/1\.1" status: (?P<status>\d+) len: \d+ time: (?P<response_time>[\d\.]+)"
  | unwrap response_time
